TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k ɑː s d ɛ l ə æ s k h ɜː t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð ɪ s ɪ ŋ z w ɪ z h ɚ f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t oːɹ s ɪ k s b oʊ n z ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p iː s f aɪ v s ɪ k s l æ p s ʌ v ɐ b l uː tʃ iː z s æ n d m eɪ b iː ɐ s n æ k f ɔːɹ h ɚ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ ɐ b ɑː p w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɑː p l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ ɡ t ɔː f ɹ ɑː k f ɹ ʌ m ð ə k iː s ɐ ʃ iː k æ n s s ɡ ɹ uː p ð iː z ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t uː θ ɹ iː ɹ ɛ d b æ ɡ z æ n d w iː w ɪ ɡ oʊ m iː t h ɚ w ɛ n z d eɪ æ t ð ə t ɹ eɪ n s t eɪ ʃ ə
